item.title: PFE
item.description: score:-20 Chances: Pfizer’s gene therapy approval in Canada for hemophilia B indicates a potential for growth in the rare disease treatment market.Pfizer’s acquisition of Seagen Inc. and the expected financial impact for FY24 demonstrate the company’s strategic expansion and growth plans.Pfizer’s participation in the 42nd Annual J.
